name: Media - Right Aligned
heading: right aligned media
description: Documentation and examples for Bootstrap's media object to construct highly repetitive components like blog comments, tweets, and the like.
usage: Media in a media object can be aligned with flexbox utilities to the top (default), middle, or end of your .media-body content.
